# Preface
This modularized shiny apps is created using `golem` framework. 

# Potential Use
- Stock screener: to help investor pick stock using certain indicator (fundamental, technical, and strategy)
- Backtest strategy: help investor backtest their own strategy under certain period
- Portfolio builder: help investor build portfolio 
- Watchlist: monitor stock movement
